Description: Fragment of double-sided wooden comb, neither end is preserved. On one edge are 11 teeth while on the other are 17 closely-set teeth with one broken. Decoration comprises four incised parallel lines along the central part of the comb and a pair at the base of each set of teeth.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), South Rampart Street Section A Level: 3B-3C
